name: Sketchbook Express iCloud Image
summary: Learn about .SBP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SBP files are used for storing files in a location that can be accessed by both the desktop and iOS versions of Sketchbook. When saving an SBP file, Sketchbook Express changes the dimensions of the image so that it will fit on the iOS device's screen. Also, the number of maximum layers is reduced to six.
NOTE: Sketchbook Express has been discontinued and is no longer available.

description: Image created by Sketchbook Express, a drawing, sketching, and painting iOS program; saves the state of the drawing canvas for storage in iCloud, which is Apple's file storage and sharing service.
